name: ::modern geometric wall sculpture::
description: Beautiful solid acrylic artwork measures 36x18 inches and is layered with thick red, blue, green, yellow and black acrylic shapes in a classic design. Attached to a solid white acrylic background. Completely hand painted, cut and flame polished. The richness of color and contrast sets this artwork apart from any canvas painting. Amazing glass smooth finish, clean lines, and three dimensional design make this piece stand out in any decor. This piece also features built-in keyhole shaped mounts on the back for a simple and easy installation. Signed and dated.

name: ::modern one piece::
description: Very nice original artwork available here from the original artist. A 6"x56" acrylic sheet is hand painted in a beautiful array of blue, brown and green tones. The front surface is glass smooth and gives this piece a truly sleek, modern look. This artwork also has a clear frame which gives the piece wonderful depth. Built in mounting brackets for easy hanging. Signed and dated on back.

name: ::bumper to bumper::
description: Amazing art available from the original artist. Large white acrylic panel is layered with a fantastic array of vibrant colored stripes. Glass smooth 1/4 inch thick panel measures 48"x16". Includes keyhole shaped mounts on the back for a simple and easy installation. Sure to brighten any room with it's brilliant colors and sleek style.  Signed and dated.

name: ::flashing lights::
description: Very nice artwork in a rainbow of colors for sale by the original artist. A 6"x48" acrylic sheet is covered in a beautiful array of striped blocks. Glass smooth acrylic blocks are 1/4" thick and are each hand painted. The gloss black background gives this piece a truly sleek modern look and adds amazing depth and richness to the colors. This artwork has a built-in frame with keyhole shaped mounting brackets on the back for easy installation.

name: ::modern geometric mirror sculpture::
description: Truly unique artwork available from the original artist. This artwork measures 24x24 inches and is covered in an array of acrylic mirror tiles. Standard reflective mirror squares and rectangles are mounted at random heights and angles to create a spectacular design of light and color. Sleek, modern, crisp edges and angles define this style. Hand crafted quality sets this piece apart. Solid acrylic backing keeps the artwork lightweight and sturdy while still remaining relatively inconspicuous. Includes built-in mounting brackets on the back for easy installation. Add the right lighting and the possibilities are endless. I tried to take pics in different lighting and reflective conditions to show what this piece is capable of. Signed and dated on back.
